name: Rise (itch) (IronArshXS)
description:
Rise HELLO

 This is my first game published on itch.io . 

Please play as I am only 12

This is created using JavaScript and html. 

There can be some glitches as this is my first time on itch.io

And if you like my game but can't play due to glitches then use this link :-

https://fasahatarsh.github.io/RISEUP/

Visit my GitHub For Source Code and More-

https://github.com/FASAHATarsh/RISEUP

Controls

Use these keys to move the ball.

W to move up

D to move right 

S to move left

Yeah there is more of artwork than the game itself still  

don't forget to rate my game.

Please comment your high scores and feedback 

It will make my day.

~ By IronArsh
